numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that people who are between 15 years and 24 years are happier than older people.
2. I noticed that people who are between 15 years and 24 years see things in a better way than older people.
3. I wonder why this is the case.
4. I wonder about statistics about the views of kids who are younger than 15 years.

10. The headline is: Is everyone depressed?
